content:
> **crochet dishcloth series
** > ======================================= > this design is part of a larger collection of dishcloth patterns all of which feature a unique stitch pattern
> find out more here → ** ned & mimi crochet dishcloth series 1 ** **interlocking shells washcloth** this crochet washcloth pattern is an exciting project that you can re-create in a variety of color options the pattern is written for two sizes washcloth and tea towel but it also includes customization instructions so you can make any size you wish **materials** **yarn ** any weight 4/worsted weight yarn in a cotton or cotton blend * washcloth approx 98yds / 90m * tea towel 396yds / 362m *recommended yarns * * drops paris 2 * wecrochet dishie 3 * paintbox yarns cotton aran 4 * lion brand 24/7 cotton 5 * rico creative cotton aran 6 **hook ** 4 5mm g-7 crochet hook 7 --- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 8 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more ---- © ned & mimi 2024 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted * 1 https //nedandmimi com/free-crochet-dishcloth-patterns/ 2 https //www laughinghens com/knitting-wool/drops-paris#nedandmimi 3 https //shrsl com/4cok0 4 https //www lovecrafts com/en-us/p/paintbox-yarns-cotton-aran utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=c1d083d7 5 https //lovecrafts com/en-us/p/lion-brand-24-7-cotton utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=c1d083d7 6 https //www lovecrafts com/en-us/p/rico-creative-cotton-aran utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=c1d083d7 7 https //shrsl com/3p74i 8 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe
